description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Proven (4), Unbalanced, Devastating (2), Warp Weapon

Note: Weapon: Great Weapon. Daemon WP 88 (Greater Daemon of Khorne), Bind Str 5. Att.: Fuelled by Slaughter, Impossibly Sharp, Skulltaker. Grants Wielder Lightning Attack and Frenzy Talents. Must have Mark of Khorne, Two Handed unless Strength Bonus 10+, Daemon frees itself automatically if wielder dies. Regain 1d10 Wounds per living creature killed, Called Melee Shots on the Head are +0 and a Half Action.
